name: Black Box (Borderandry)
description:
You found a computer, it claims it comes from the end of the world.

A narrative-focused game that delves into my experience, how I feel after 2020, something more personal than usual, as if I were a computer with a psychanalist.

Credits: Andrea Rosini

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" (WinterSemester 2020/21)
